text: hananimkkeseo geu go-eul-ui baegseong deullobuteo ppaeas-a geubun-ui seonjija ege jusin modeun geos-eun hananimgwa seonjijawa chincheoggwa goadeulgwa pil-yo lo han salamgwa yeohaengjaleul wihan geos eulo neohui gaunde buyuhan ja-ege bunbaedoeneun geos-i anila geuligo seon jijakkeseo neohuiege jun geos-eun sulag hadoe geubunkkeseo geumgihan geos-eun geojeol hago hananim-eul dulyeowohala sillo hananim-eun eomhan eungbeol-eul naelisinila
